In just 15 days, the phone started hanging and while playing games at 50% brightness.  By playing games together, the phone becomes very hot within 15 minutes, up to 42 degrees, I am afraid that I should not go on my feet. Missed audio Jake a lot.

Name: Rakesh
Review Title: MY FIRST PHONE THAT I BOUGHT WITH MY MONEY
Review: And I gotta say i am damn impressed by this phone.It is so good.The battery life is good , but you can't get bothered with that because , man it takes approximately 32 minutes to charge from 1 - 100 , which is so fast, like you could read a newspaper or take a bath or eat food and come back and see it's charged fast.The camera is also good.But th thing I like the most is the smoothness that i get when I use my mobile , like this is too smooth and good to use and also the storage is also a plus point.I gotta say , this is the best phone that a guy or a girl can buy to enjoy.

Name: Megha D
Review Title: Not to buy this phone review 2 month use.
Review: This phone I brought in month of oct-21 but I'm not at all satisfy with this phone phone Bcoz when I site to play game it's getting hang and suddenly its stop working and camera Quality it also not proper when clicked photo gets if zoom out than it getting fade same as normal phone.earlier I was having Redmi note 5 pro it much exllecent then this this phone by all terms and:- Camera, Working, accessibility, price etc plz don't buy this phone it's waste of money seriously. And also when I asked for replacement / refund then also no one customer service had entertain for this issue, then we buy OnePlus by giving much higher amount then another if there is no customer satisfaction.

Name: karthik
Review Title: I have made worst choice by picking first oneplus phone. Amazon please test quality befor sell
Review: This is my first one plus phone. I am really excited when I bought. But my excitement really hadn't last longer. The phone is heating lot. Batter is draining. When I making calls the calls are dropping. I didn't expect one plus to sell phones like these. Even without testing quality of their phones. Things I liked is oxygen os which is smooth and speakers. Display and camera is average. I don't recommend this device. Please go and purchase samsung or motorola instead of buying these Chinese products. Amazon please test the quality of the product before you sell in your website

Name: AN
Review Title: Excellent product with very good brand positioning.
Review: Amazing looks, excellent display and cameras. Special mechanical slider button for ringer, vibration and silent is a delightful feature.Two drawbacks, no audio jack 3.5 mm, no screen guard in the pack.Rest all is very good.

Name: sabu
Review: Camera -One of worst camera experience.It just stop working all of a sudden and you got stuck in middle of no where.just pathetic not expected this type of camera experience.Mobile Phone sometimes gets heat up and you can feel it.

Name: Rupesh
Review Title: Good camera, some bugs on enabling app cloning
Review: Design 8/10 (solid build, plastic farme)In hand feel 9/10Camera 7/10 (selfie camera needs improvement)Battery 09/10 (8 hrs of screen on time for normal users)Charging 10/10Sound.  07/10 (quite loud, quality is just average)Performance 9/10 (fast for a normal user)Software 8/10 (noticed some bugs)Display 8/10 ( Good enough for normal user)Network reception 10/10 ( 7 5g bands wifi 6, 4g+, good call quality)Haptics 09/10Happy with the product.

Name: Satish
Review: Phone is good but battery drain very fast. Average product by Oneplus.

Name: SRI PRAJAPATI CONSTRUCTIONS
Review Title: 35000 हजार रुपेय का प्रोडक्ट है ₹3500 का भी नहीं लगता है
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   Product bahut hi kharab hai company Mujhe refund Karen aur product le jaaiye another Mujhe social media Ka Sahara Lena Padega

Name: Consumer
Review: Great phone at 30k price range super fast snappy buttery smooth performance camera is nice battery backup is nice jst there is only one drawback that is the outer frame which is not metallic it is a polycarbonate plastic it will get scratch over time

Name: Prativa Bhanja
Review: MY KEY HIGHLIGHT POINTS FOR THE PHONE ARE:-1. Smooth and amazing 90Hz AMOLED display!2. 65W in-box charger, charges the device very quickly. Like my phone charges from a 30% to 90% within 15mins or so.3. ABSOLUTELY PHENOMENAL CAMERA. 50MP main camera with OIS is just amazing.4. In-Display fingerprint Sensor is snappy fast.5. Grey color is good for every occasion.

Name: Ketan
Review: After a lot of waiting, evaluating, finally got the phone with perfect specs & price .. not over priced like flagship, but performance equal or better! Awesome camera pics, good design & build. Got in net 19k after exchange, credit card discount. So definitely worth it!

Name: Sourav Chowdhury
Review Title: Quality phone both from inside and outside..
Review: I will go straight to the point-1) Build quality is very good.2)Looks are stylish.3) Display is awesome with 90Hz refresh rate.4)Processor is working great along with 12gb ram.5) Though I am not a gaming savy guy but I am sure it will be smooth with this phone.6) Camera is just rocking..The rear one is 48MP with OIS which is clicking awesome photos.Front one is also descent with 32MP.7)Last but not the least One Plus Nord 2 is great in this price range.

Name: J A
Review Title: Good phone and a decent price
Review: Sleek looking phone and can be used with one hand unlike some other phones. Reasonably priced. Express charging with good battery performance. Some office applications performance is not optimum though - especially outlook and teams, Slight lag on trying to open notifications.

Name: Yogesh
Review: But, they could have improved camera quality. I am not that satisfied with it.Seems battery drains fast…. Will have to observe for few more days as its delivered today only..Super duper fast charging.. charged my phone from 8% to 100% in 41 mins.Nothing much to say..

Name: Rahul
Review Title: Camera is pretty good in this budget
Review: Battery life, value for money, clean OS, zero bloatwares. Other smartphones from different brands have there on UI's filled with bloatwares and you can't do anything about it. There are better phones in this price range for performance and all but what's the point of having it when you don't have a clean UI. This one worths every penny. Hope you people found this useful !

Name: Abhinav Dutta
Review Title: Its a good phone but the front camera don't feels like 32MP there is lot of noise in the camera
Review: Over all a good phone but lot of noise in the front and back camera its night mode is one of the best in market till date.Hope with update camera will work more good

Name: Kunal Jagtap
Review: This model has serious issue of screen freezing. I started facing this issue just after a week from the day I am using my new phone.Please think twice before you order this product or wait till the next stable update from OnePlus.

Name: Suraj k.
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   It's awesome, this phone is mind-blowing product at this segment.It's look very premium.In hand feel is awesome.You should definitely goes for it if your budget is 30k.Camera quality is also good, but not at high level.The important thing for this phone is oxygen os and one plus branding.65w charger is a monster 💀-it takes 33min to complete charge.This is definitely called a flagship phone.There is one thing that I thought it should better is- instead of dimensity they should give Snapdragon.If you buy it, then you never regret at your decision.

Name: Balkrishna Varma
Review Title: One Plus Nord 2 is Good Camera Phone
Review: Guys if you are looking for Good Smart Phone with all Good features. One Plus Nord2 is one of the best phone available in india. Guys the best part is this phone get charged just in 30 min, Camera and Speaker Phone is awesome. Finger Print takes no time to unlock the screen. Batter last for 1.5 days. Means good for anyone who is good talkative. I love the camera quality it's just unbearable in this price. Guys I'll strongly recommend for this phone. We get 2 options for RAM 8gb and 12 gbans comes in 3 different color variants.

Name: Seema Jaswani
Review: Oneplus by far has the best phones in Android. The speed, the user interface, the entire look and feel of the phone is amazing! Never heats or hangs! It’s a phone that one will repeat. I used the Oneplus 6 for 3 years and now moved to the Nord2. It the most amazing phone in that budget

Name: Manoj Kumar
Review: Pros:1) can charge very fast and can last one whole day2) Can handle the high end games and applications very easily3) Rear camera is good4) Screen quality is OK5) Build quality is very good and I like leather finishCons:1) Front camera is worst.2) 90 hz screen can be better3) mobile is getting stuck while playing video in youtube and also some times audio fluctuates while listening to music and browsing in youtube.4) OS is little buggy5) HDR is not available in prime and Netflix6)

Name: Sumit Kumar
Review: Flagship camera sensorwith great OnePlus signature designIf you're not a hard-core gamer than you should definitely consider this phoneOxygen OS is still the same just few apps are changed with Color OS and there are extra customisation options from color osBetter than all nords out there

Name: Kush lulla
Review: Everything is ok just doesn't feel like my OnePlus.... It's like an oppo phone with OnePlus sticker... Can't do call recording for all calls... Even if u manually turn it on it sends out a warning to the person on the phone that the call is being recorded.

Name: jayant
Review: Hi thr, here's my review after 15 days of use.I am a light user means I don't use my mobile on the heavier side..I just wanted a phone which feels good to hold, looks premium, good screen quality, good battery and camera...that's all.In this mobile I got all I need.Charging speed is awesome and with my usage one n half day usage is easy one. It gives almost 6-7 hours of screen on time..I would highly recommend this mobile. Thumbs up for one plus.

Name: Sandeep Kaushal
Review Title: 10 days experience of handset is amazing...
Review: Posting the review after reqrous use of handset that are below as :-Front and back camera is stunning..- battery backup is commendable-Display/ fingerprint/ screen smoothness is awasome..In last I tried to search negative things about phone, but could not found even single one..- can purchase without any single doubt..Thanks one plus for releasing such phones..

Name: Sudir Raj
Review Title: Hangs . Stops working . Auto deleting wallpaper. Forgets the ringtone i kept for it
Review: When i open cameras . It auto closes . Battery is not that much good . I loved the camera and bought . But its just ordinary camerA. No great one plus touch in it. Need the process suddenly closes . And it making a auto restart Every a on a day . To tally fcuked up . By this mobile . Too bad and sad . Any help . I bought on prime day . Any one give a suggest to me.

Name: Kapil_digraskar
Review: Amazing phone.. Happy customer 😊Pros: 1. Beast charger (I charged 0 to 100% in 30min)2. improved camera (espacially rear). AI technology looks promising.3. Premium look. Feels like 50k phone in hand4. Stereo speakers are power-packed.5. Reformed Oxygen OS6. Backing OnePlus as brand7. Heptics are awesome8. Perfect screen size. (6.4 inch is ideal)Cons:.1. 120hz refresh rate is should have given.2. Sd memory card is missing.3. Front camera do not live up to expectations.4. Security issue(why camera is asking me to accept some random terms 😐)5. No wireless charging and waterproof rating.Overall it's a practical phone with premium look."One plus's home coming"💫

Name: Sandy
Review Title: Its alive bomb in pocket, many cases of blast
Review: Its live bomb, scared to use it now. Please refund, many people seeing blast.Very Fast, everything is niceBut camera is total artificial all images are beautified to look nice... So dont expect real clarity... Otherwise camera sensor also nice... But pixel and purane onplus jaise clean photos nahi aate

Name: Kunal Bose
Review: Its not meet my expectations.I bought this product from amazon on 21st Jan and also bought a type c earphone for my phone from oneplus site,but while I using it its not working properly.So I have gone to service centre for repair,they replaced it with a new.But I faced same problem like previous one.So I talk to the engineers of "Oneplus Service centre" and they said to deposit my phone for 4-5days.Not even I'm using it 15 days properly and get a major problem.They said"If its hardaware problem then the product shuold be replaced with a new".But if anyone think to buy "Oneplus nord 2",I will suggest not to waste 30k of his Important money.

Name: umang
Review: Ok so let's talk about camera Quality.OnePlus Nord 2 camera is awesome but abhi ruko if you are useing  50 MP camera so after clicking one picture you need to wait for 5 minutes because your camera automatically turn off and you are not able to use camera againe for 5 minutes and I am sure after one month I'll share my full reviewThanks

Name: Prateek
Review Title: Good buy! Super upgrade from the previous Nord versions..
Review: Recieved the product on 27th July. It's been 3 days. The most astonishing feature is the charging, it takes less than 40 mins to full charge if battery less than 10%. Smooth interface, doesn't hang. Good graphics, looks like One Plus 9R model, looks better than the previous Nord version.Only con for me is the absence of the 3.5 mm jack, otherwise all good.

Name: sandesh pandit
Review Title: No cost EMI is myth they are giving extra discount and then charging 1.3333% interest.
Review: Everything is perfect except the wide angle camera pics seems desaturated.No cost EMI is myth they are giving extra discount and then charging 1.3333% interest. Great phone if you buy with exchange offer.Phone is not water resistant as per one plus.

Name: Narendra Singh Inda
Review Title: Substandard build quality, horrible build quality from one plus
Review: Phone build quality is horrible, not what is expected from one plus. Back side glass so fragile that even with the cover delivered with the phone, back side glass shattered with just putting it on the table. Such fragile build quality was not expected from one plus.  Waste of money.

Name: Navdeep Singh
Review: No discription required for Oneplus. 10/10 for NORD 2.PRIMIUM BUILD QUALITYPRIMIUM LOOKOPTIMUM PERFORMANCEBEST IN CLASSMAINTAINING A1 STANDARDTruly satisfied once again with Oneplus. Over all rating 5*.

Name: Mukesh S.
Review Title: Heating issues, bad camera, low battery backup
Review: Posting this review after using the phone for 15 days.Phone heats up alot while using camera app or while playing games. Already heard a couple of news of Nord2's explosion, which is very scary.Camera quality is not good, images are not sharp and get lot of softness in the photos.Battery backup is not good, can last only upto 5-6hrs.Charging speed is very fast however battery doesn't last for long.Really disappointed with this phone at this price range.

Name: Sourav saha
Review Title: Better than other Chinese brand. Thumbs Up
Review: So far nothing to dislikePros:1. Camera excellent2. Battery overall ok 7 hour Avg heavy gamer3. Charging 30 min4. Display excellent5. Touch responsive, good haptic feedback6. Sound loud and clearCons:1. Fingerprint Avg 3 out 5 time works2. Heating not much3. Low light camera struggle4. Low tint effect from side view

Name: Tini anil kumar
Review Title: Amazed by the performance of this phone!
Review: Got it by exchanging my 4-year-old moto, So for 26K. The Camera works great and the pictures are absolutely breathtaking. Performance is quite smooth. It gave me a full charge in about 15 mins. I have been using it for two days on one charge, So the battery is pretty great too. Happy with my purchase. Thank you One Plus and the seller for this product. Amazon rarely disappoints.

Name: Ajay Rathor
Review: No battery heating issue my  phoneAnd no any other problems

Name: Hasanfzs
Review Title: Leather Skin(Green Wood) is Amazing to use even without backcase especially for holding...
Review: Both Cameras(Front and Back) are good especially Back... In-Display finger print sensor is good but slow... 4500mAh battery takes only 30mins to reach 100% from 0%... The sound quality and loudness is incomparable with other mobile phones... Display quality is Amazing...

Name: Syed Muhammad Nihal
Review: Its been 5 months since I'm using this device.Camera is impressive with added features.I don't play games so Dimensity 1200 is pretty good for my activities.Battery is good.If you are a medium user it lasts for a day.If you are a heavy user it gives nice backup.Full charge time is 30 minutes.Display is nice because of amoled panel.If you switch from 120hz to 90hz you will feel the difference.If you switch from a old device to this you will feel this smoother.Haptics are impressive.The  problems i am facing now is the white light (flash) turns on automatically when I switch to front camera.

Name: Shailesh s s
Review: Very good device. Charges full in 33 mins. I feel battery backup isn't great. It's good but I feel it could have been better as it has only 90hz display.Good back camera. Poor front camera. Even phones with 20k price have better front camera.worst selfie cam. no heating issue for normal usage. No problems faced. U can buy it without any worry. Smooth as f. very clean UI. u can contact me if u have any doubt.Edit - after 40 days of usage .I have no problem with the device ..I am getting screen on time of 7 hours 30 mins..I am going to attach a screenshot of it.

Name: JDass
Review: It's a sturdy and responsive phone. No complaint about its quality or performance. But recent news of its batteries randomly bursting is a cause of concern. The company must recall all the phones to address this issue.

Name: RG
Review: After using one month the feedback isPros -Phone Aesthetic is good,Rear Camera is Very goodCons -Front camera performance is patheticDuring video call, front camera image gets stillWhile surfing Photo gallery or website, phone gets hang or badly slows down.Heat up while charging as well with little heavy use.Couldn't feel the effect of 8 GB RAM

Name: Vishal
Review: To be honest the phone is overhyped...Best things- Superfast charging- decent camera- nice UIWorst things- fingerprint scanner is so so annoying, i can't tell u, how irritating it is.. it fails to read thumbs 5 out of 10 times...- overweight (200 gm, without cover),(225 gm with cover)- front camera is pathetic, also video stabilization in main camera is so poor (Real disappointment)- Some apps face regular bugs... But updating theim resolves the issue ( Irritating sometimes)

Name: Kunal Bhagwan Shirsath
Review Title: Battery Drain is very fast . very Average phone this is..
Review: Battery Drain was fast . After using last 2 days and full charge for some time & enable all battery optimization settings . Reduce refresh rate 60khz . Its look good backup & less battery draining now. But Cammer AI environment is not good . Its making every image as animated . You find this issue after 2x,5x zoom of camera images . I feel its not giving you original clear image . Previous technology like pixel breking after zoom was much better than current animated AI effects . OnePlus should looks into it.

Name: Arjun Nair
Review: Fully feature loaded phone with a good camera and top notch displayOnly point where its a thumbs down is the battery life - although the warp 65 charger takes only 12 minutes to charge it to more than 90% but still the juice doesn't last for more than 15-18 hours

Name: Shalender Nath
Review: A good phone to buy.Pros:-1. Main camera is great.2. Performance is good.3. UI is great.4. Battery is good and charger is great.5. Ram management is great.6. Design is great.7. Display is great.Cons:-1. 90Hz diplay and not 120Hz2. Fingerprint scanner working is a bit slow, little bit slow as i thought (may be okay to you).3. Front camera is 32mp but not working like 32, it's working like 16mp (it may improve after update but i m not sure).Overall a balanced phone without any ads or bloatware.I want to give 4.5 out of 5

Name: Amandeep Sharma
Review: It's worst mobile in segment price 30k because battery life too poor and camera quality too worst. Please go to MI OR SAMSUNG IF YOU HAVE TO BUY MOBILE SEGMENT 30k.  in price segy 30k OnePlus Nord worst mobile if OnePlus not to fixed bug of camera and battery I also bin that mobile and purchase another mobile like my opinion buy Mi or samsung

Name: dr.parimal ranajan de
Review: The phone is very nice.. battery life is little low. 1 single charge wil go till 1 day if ur not doing any gaming or video call . Camera is pretty good I liked it actually. Charging is very fast. 30mins n ur phone wil b fully charged. Very fast processor

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Look and Feel is very premium. Software is very clean. Camera Quality is very good. We will update long term review after few days.

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Pros:-Phone looks premiumFast Charging is awesomeSound quality is goodPhone is pretty fast so farCons:-Not happy with indoor camera picsPictures are not clear after zoomNo headphone jackNo headset in the box

Name: Mukesh Kumar
Review: Pros:1.) Display is good and refresh rate is Ok2.) Wrap charging gives me a fantastic full charge within minutes.3.) Dual Speaker gives good Audio performanceCons:1.) HEATING ISSUE  -Sometimes while charging it heats tremendously without reason.At that time I think about Oppo parent comapny resemblence to this.2.)Camera is not upto the mark,poor clarity when I zoom it either while shooting and the images as well.3.) UI -Color OS not have any unique speciality when attached to Oxygen.Thinking about is it worth for money after 1month rigorous use.

Name: Rajat Kumar Sahoo
Review: If your budget is around 30k then just go for it. Pretty much satisfied with the phone. Not a heavy Gamer and for daily uses its awesome with good camera and display.  Charging speed is good and back camera is also outstanding. And most important thing is OnePlus oxygen os. Clean and cool os and those who are complaing about camera interface it's good actually with some new features.

Name: Sachin Yadav
Review: Dear Amazon,I have purchased Oneplus Nord 2 last weeks. My mobile back camera has dust inside it. It seems like a manufacturing defects. I have also compared my device with others one. Kindly resolve my issue.

Name: Balasubramani R
Review: Battery life stands for 1 full day with moderate usageCharges in 40 minsCamera quality is goodOverall performance is good

Name: Siddhesh Mohan Patil
Review: This is an average mobile phone like other android phones. Call recorder system is the worst. When call recording is ON another person gets notification on the same call. Hence 3rd party application is required for call recording. Camera lenses are also average. Photos gets enhanced after clicking but clearly go away when you save those photos. Provided plastic case is low quality. Sometimes phone gets hanged due to downloading some application.Not recommend for all. Search for another phone in same price range.

Name: Pankaj
Review Title: Super phone I must say🥰 just loved it. An update to Nord is exactly what we needed🤗
Review: After using it for a week, I likes it's camera which is really nice. Front camera require some improvement but still works fine. It has an amazing charging speed, 66 watt charger is the real killer. Amazing backup. Just loved it🥰. Worth every single penny. An all-rounder in this price segment.🤗

Name: Praveen
Review: It behaves like iron box instead of mobile phone.Battery is draining out in 5hrs.If you have an egg u can easily burn an omlet on it .Not all major cities of A.P are having service centers.Better you check for the nearest service center then choose this product if you are ok with mobile heat like iron box.I really mean it.

Name: Dushyant
Review: Overall the phone works exactly as advertised..but battery could have been bigger..no doubt the battery gets fully charged from 0-100 in just 30 mints max..but it drains quicker, even if you are not a gamer

Name: Rajeesh km
Review: Performance is not reach expectation level

Name: Mohammed Hanif
Review Title: The Best Smartphone in the 30k price segment!
Review: This is the best smartphone ever in the 30k price segment,an amazing performance despite a new chipset of Dimensity 1200,which gives and equivalent performance of Snapdragon 870.Talking about the camera,it acquires it's Sony's lenses and aperture,which enhances every picture,giving it a really amazing colour touch and vibrancy.The 90Hz refresh rate is incredibly smooth,it becomes very easy to use.Then,the obvious User-Interface of OnePlus,the OxygenOS,is one of the most cleanest of UI's in today's smartphone generation.A huge thumbs up to OnePlus for launching an amazing phone at this price segment.

Name: Altaf
Review Title: The return of OnePlus as the flagship killer!
Review: Flagship grade processor (Mediatek dimensity 1200 handles everything you throw at it with ease), Great display (The 90hz AMOLED display produces truly vibrant colours), impeccable cameras (Sony IMX 766 and the overall tuning hits it out of the park be it outdoor or low light conditions) & incredibly fast charging (65 watt warp charger is super quick).
